org.artifactory.sapi.fs

Interface MutableVfsFile

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MutableVfsItem<MutableFileInfo>, VfsFile<MutableFileInfo>, VfsItem<MutableFileInfo>

    public interface MutableVfsFile
extends MutableVfsItem<MutableFileInfo>, VfsFile<MutableFileInfo>
    A mutable interface of a virtual file.
    Author:
    Yossi Shaul

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fillData(InputStream in) 
      void fillInfo(FileInfo sourceInfo)
      Fills the non-content dependent fields (real checksums) from the source info.
      void setClientChecksum(ChecksumType type, String checksum)
      Sets the client provided checksum.
      void setClientMd5(String md5)
      Sets the client provided md5 checksum.
      void setClientSha1(String sha1)
      Sets the client provided sha1 checksum.
      void setStats(StatsInfo statsInfo)
      Sets the statistics data on this mutable file.
      boolean useData(String sha1, String md5, long length)
      Automatically adds a binary record to the database if binary matching the given sha1 exists in the binary provider.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.artifactory.sapi.fs.MutableVfsItem

        addWatch, delete, hasPendingChanges, isDeleted, isMarkedForDeletion, isNew, markError, save, setCreated, setCreatedBy, setModified, setModifiedBy, setProperties, setUpdated

    • Method Detail

      • setClientChecksum

        void setClientChecksum(@Nonnull
                     ChecksumType type,
                     @Nullable
                     String checksum)
        Sets the client provided checksum. This value is provided by the user and might not be a valid checksum.
        Parameters:
        type - The checksum type. Either sha1 or md5
        checksum - The user provided checksum value

      • setClientSha1

        void setClientSha1(@Nullable
                 String sha1)
        Sets the client provided sha1 checksum. This value is provided by the user and might not be a valid checksum.
        Parameters:
        sha1 - The user provided sha1 checksum

      • setClientMd5

        void setClientMd5(String md5)
        Sets the client provided md5 checksum. This value is provided by the user and might not be a valid checksum.
        Parameters:
        md5 - The user provided sha1 checksum

      • fillData

        void fillData(InputStream in)

      • setStats

        void setStats(StatsInfo statsInfo)
        Sets the statistics data on this mutable file. Used only during import.
        Parameters:
        statsInfo - The stats info to set on this file

      • fillInfo

        void fillInfo(FileInfo sourceInfo)
        Fills the non-content dependent fields (real checksums) from the source info.
        Parameters:
        sourceInfo - The source file info to read data from

      • useData

        boolean useData(String sha1,
              String md5,
              long length)
        Automatically adds a binary record to the database if binary matching the given sha1 exists in the binary provider. This method is required to support skeleton import.
        Parameters:
        sha1 - The binary sha1 checksum
        md5 - The binary md5 checksum
        length - The length of the binary
        Returns:
        True if the record exists or was added successfully
